title: [BUG] Skottie animation crash on WPF application
body:
**Description**

Application crashes when trying to draw a Lottie file with Skottie
[lottie file](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nwa3hrjonlaj8vm/test.json?dl=0)

**Code**

`using var stream = File.Open(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read);`
 `if (Animation.TryCreate(stream, out var _animation))`
 `{`
`   _animation.Seek(0);`
`   SkElement.PaintSurface += (sender, e) =>_animation.Render(e.Surface.Canvas,`
`       new SKRect(0, 0, _animation.Size.Width, _animation.Size.Height));`
 `}`

**Expected Behavior**

Lottie animation is rendered

**Actual Behavior**

Crash

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 2.88.3
- Last known good version: ???
- IDE: Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks
  - Windows Classic: WPF, .NET Framework 4.8 
- Target Devices:
  - Windows PC
